name: Tales from the Fridge: Prolouge
description:
A short Bitsy game following the adventures of June Vara on the icy planet FR1093, or more commonly referred to as 'the Fridge"! 

Made for Global Game Jame 2021!

Thanks tooo:
Adam Le Doux - For making Bitsy in the first place!  
Sean - For the 'Avatar By Room' Hack
